mapper.insert: insert into () select #{appNo}, #{orderNo}, #{appType}, #{status}, #{procInstId}, #{applyUserId}, areaCode, platType, deployType, envCode, resType, virName, virIp, cpu, memory, diskType, diskSize, diskEncrypt, softCode, softParam, projectCode, osType, osBitNum, imgCode, imgUserName, imgUserPass, imgPath, expireDate, virNum, #{totalAmt}, '0', fileName from cmp_order where orderNo=#{orderNo}
mapper.select:
select from
where 1=1
and appType=#{pd.workorder_type}
and status=#{pd.workorder_status}
and projectCode=#{pd.project}
and id like %#{pd.workorder_id}%
and date_sub(CURDATE(),interval 7 day) <= date(createTime)
and date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 month)<=date(createTime)
and date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 year)<=date(createTime)
and procInstId in (
select DISTINCT PROC_INST_ID_ from t where 1=1
and t.ASSIGNEE_ = #{pd.USERNAME}
and t.ASSIGNEE_ in (select distinct a.username from t_usergroup_user_map a , t_usergroup_user_map b where a.usergroup_id = b.usergroup_id and b.username = #{pd.USERNAME})
UNION
select DISTINCT r.PROC_INST_ID_ from r , i where r.ID_ = i.TASK_ID_ and i.TYPE_ = 'candidate' and i.USER_ID_=#{pd.USERNAME} ) order by status asc

select from
where 1=1 and procInstId in (
select DISTINCT r.PROC_INST_ID_ from r , i where 1=1 and r.ID_ = i.TASK_ID_ and (i.TYPE_ = 'candidate' or i.TYPE_='participant') and i.USER_ID_=#{pd.USERNAME} ) order by
appNo
${pd.sortCol}
desc
${pd.sortType}
